trait.name: Regenerating Aura
entries: Any creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the daystrider must succeed on a {@dc 21} Constitution saving throw or heal 14 ({@damage 4d6}) health. A creature's hitpoint maximum is reduced by any amount over their maximum they would be healed until the next long rest. A creature dies if it's hitpoint maximum hits 0, the creature dies. Undead and constructs are immune to this aura.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The daystrider uses Energetic Focus twice, or it uses Energetic Focus and Finger of Life, if available.

action.name: Energetic Focus
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}28 ({@damage 5d8 + 6}) radiant damage. The target must succeed on a {@dc 21} Constitution saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the radiant damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest.

action.name: Finger of Life {@recharge}
entries: The daystrider points at one creature it can see within 300 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 21} Wisdom saving throw or take 26 ({@damage 4d12}) radiant damage and become {@condition blinded} until the end of the daystrider's next turn. While {@condition blinded} in this way, the creature is also {@condition paralyzed}. If a target's saving throw is successful, the target is immune to the daystrider's Finger of Life for the next 24 hours.
